description: Number of integer-sided triangles of area 6n.
comments: If integer-sided triangle has integer area, area is divisible by 6.
prog: (PARI) a(n)=sum(z=sqrtint(sqrtint(192*n^2)-1)+1,sqrtint(9*(64*n^2+5)\20), sum(y=z\2+1,z, my(t=(y*z)^2-(12*n)^2,x); if(issquare(t,&t), (issquare(y^2+z^2-2*t,&x) && x<=y) + (t && issquare(y^2+z^2+2*t,&x) && x<=y), 0))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 27 2013
author: _David W. Wilson_
